The wind direction and speed changed 180 degrees and 109 knots...Read more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/news-listing/2019/july/radar-corner]]> Inside the FMS <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/news-listing/2019/july/inside-the-fms]]> Benefits of the Next Generation Flight Management System Gold Package â€“ Wind Trade Steps Evaluation Wind Trade Steps Evaluation uses the NGFMS Atmospheric Model to compare all available flight levels to determine the most cost-efficient altitude...Read more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/news-listing/2019/july/inside-the-fms]]> Service Information Letter Briefing <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/news-listing/2019/july/service-information-letter-briefing]]> NGFMS Reset Due to Duplicate Waypoints in NAV Database The NG FMS may reset if the Active (or Secondary) Flight Plan pages have not been selected before entering waypoints...Read more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/news-listing/2019/july/service-information-letter-briefing]]> NZ FMS 6.1 Benefit to Upgrade <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/news-listing/2019/july/nz-fms-6-1-benefit-to-upgrade]]> RNP Monitoring and Alerting RNP enables many procedures to be used that would not otherwise be available...Read more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/news-listing/2019/july/nz-fms-6-1-benefit-to-upgrade]]>
